DFFlagAudioSpeechToTextRequireVoiceChat2.purpose: It helps players communicate more easily by allowing them to speak instead of type, making conversations smoother.

FFlagAXSavePreviousPageFromQuickMenu.mechanism: This flag allows the game to remember the last page you were on in the quick menu, so you can return to it easily.
FFlagAXSavePreviousPageFromQuickMenu.purpose: It improves user experience by saving time and making it easier for players to navigate the quick menu without starting over.

FFlagReverbAbsorptionField.mechanism: This feature adjusts how sound behaves in different spaces within the game, making it more realistic.
FFlagReverbAbsorptionField.purpose: It enhances the audio experience by making sounds echo or absorb differently based on the environment, creating a more immersive gameplay.

FFlagAXEnableItemDetailsTryOnPage2.mechanism: This flag allows players to see detailed information about items when trying them on in a specific section of the game.
FFlagAXEnableItemDetailsTryOnPage2.purpose: It helps players make better choices by providing more information about items, improving their shopping experience in the game.

FFlagNetworkInterface.mechanism: This flag enables a new way for different parts of the Roblox game to communicate with each other more efficiently.
FFlagNetworkInterface.purpose: It helps improve the overall performance and speed of games, making them run smoother for players.

FFlagAXOutlineSubcategoryPill.mechanism: This flag changes how categories are displayed in the user interface, adding a new visual style to subcategories.
FFlagAXOutlineSubcategoryPill.purpose: It makes it easier for players to navigate and find what they're looking for in the game menus, enhancing the user experience.

FFlagChatIntegrationFixShortcut.mechanism: This flag enables a fix for a shortcut issue in the chat system, ensuring that commands and messages work correctly.
FFlagChatIntegrationFixShortcut.purpose: It helps players communicate better by making sure chat commands function as intended, improving the overall chat experience.

DFFlagAndroidDebugHeapTelemetry.mechanism: This flag allows developers to collect data about memory usage on Android devices to identify and fix performance issues.
DFFlagAndroidDebugHeapTelemetry.purpose: It helps improve the game performance on Android devices, making it smoother and more enjoyable for players.

FFlagLuaAppAddSortDataToPymkCarouselClic.mechanism: This flag allows the system to organize and sort the data when players click on the recommended games carousel.
FFlagLuaAppAddSortDataToPymkCarouselClic.purpose: It helps players find games they might like more easily by showing them in a better-organized way.

FFlagAXMigrateQuickButtonsToGlobalAutoFo.mechanism: This flag changes how quick action buttons are focused on the screen, making them more accessible.
FFlagAXMigrateQuickButtonsToGlobalAutoFo.purpose: It improves the user experience by making it easier for players to use quick action buttons without having to navigate away from their current task.

FFlagReconnectToSameServer.mechanism: This flag allows players to reconnect to the same game server they were on if they get disconnected.
FFlagReconnectToSameServer.purpose: It helps players continue their game without losing progress or having to start over from a different server.

FFlagConvertVariantToCorrectType.mechanism: This flag ensures that different types of game items or features are correctly recognized and used by the game.
FFlagConvertVariantToCorrectType.purpose: It improves the game's functionality and ensures players can use items as intended, enhancing the overall gaming experience.

FFlagAXRemoveTryOnManagerAvatarScreen.mechanism: This flag disables a feature that manages how players try on different avatar items.
FFlagAXRemoveTryOnManagerAvatarScreen.purpose: It simplifies the avatar customization process, making it easier for players to change their looks without extra steps.

DFIntDataStoreFixedRequestLimit_PlaceFil.mechanism: This flag adjusts the limits on how many requests can be made to save or load player data, specifically filtering by place.
DFIntDataStoreFixedRequestLimit_PlaceFil.purpose: It improves the performance and reliability of saving player data, ensuring that players have a smoother experience when accessing their game progress.

FFlagInternalExportHandleMisnamedR15Bone.mechanism: This flag helps the system correctly identify and manage certain character parts that were incorrectly named in the R15 model.
FFlagInternalExportHandleMisnamedR15Bone.purpose: It ensures that players' characters look and behave correctly, preventing issues with animations and movements.

FFlagPerfDataOnTelemetryV2.mechanism: This flag enables the collection of performance data in a more advanced way to monitor how well the game runs.
FFlagPerfDataOnTelemetryV2.purpose: It helps developers understand and improve game performance, leading to a smoother and better gaming experience for players.

DFFlagISRBlockStaleCFrameImprovements.mechanism: This flag helps improve how the game updates the position and rotation of objects, ensuring they are more accurate and responsive.
DFFlagISRBlockStaleCFrameImprovements.purpose: It makes the game feel smoother and more realistic by preventing objects from lagging behind or appearing in the wrong place.

FFlagPurchasePromptPriceShouldUseProduct.mechanism: This flag changes the way the game shows prices for items, ensuring it pulls the latest price information directly from the product details.
FFlagPurchasePromptPriceShouldUseProduct.purpose: It ensures that players see the correct price when they want to buy something, reducing confusion and preventing unexpected charges.

FFlagAXMigrateCommunityAvatarEntryButton.mechanism: This flag switches the button for accessing community avatars to a more local version, improving performance.
FFlagAXMigrateCommunityAvatarEntryButton.purpose: It makes it faster and easier for players to find and use community-created avatars.

FFlagAXCategoryPillColorAnimation.mechanism: This flag enables a new animation for color changes on category buttons in the interface.
FFlagAXCategoryPillColorAnimation.purpose: It enhances the visual appeal and user experience by making category selections more engaging and noticeable.

FFlagAndroidTrimMemoryCounters.mechanism: This flag allows the game to monitor and manage memory usage on Android devices more effectively.
FFlagAndroidTrimMemoryCounters.purpose: It helps prevent the game from using too much memory, which can lead to smoother gameplay and fewer crashes on mobile devices.

FFlagSolverV2RefactorReplicationStateUpd.mechanism: This flag updates how the game shares information about the state of objects with players, making it more efficient.
FFlagSolverV2RefactorReplicationStateUpd.purpose: It improves the speed and reliability of how players see changes in the game, leading to a better overall experience.

FFlagEnableProfilePlatformDualCta_v5.mechanism: This flag allows the profile page to show two call-to-action buttons for different platforms (like mobile and PC) at the same time.
FFlagEnableProfilePlatformDualCta_v5.purpose: It helps players easily choose how they want to play Roblox, whether on their phone or computer, making it more convenient for them.

FFlagVideoGamePreviewSessionTracking_Sta.mechanism: This flag tracks player sessions when they preview a game before playing it, helping to gather data on how players interact with game previews.
FFlagVideoGamePreviewSessionTracking_Sta.purpose: It improves the game discovery process by understanding what players like, leading to better recommendations and experiences for them.

FFlagIncreaseEffectiveLightGridRadius.mechanism: This flag increases the area where light effects can be calculated in the game.
FFlagIncreaseEffectiveLightGridRadius.purpose: It allows for better lighting in larger areas, making the game look more realistic and visually appealing.

FFlagEnableAdOpportunityTracker4_PlaceFi.mechanism: This flag enables a system to track and filter ad opportunities based on specific game places.
FFlagEnableAdOpportunityTracker4_PlaceFi.purpose: It helps developers find better advertising options for their games, potentially increasing their revenue.

FFlagAXCatalogCategoryPillsShowAllCatego.mechanism: This flag allows the game to display all categories of items in a more organized way using pills (small buttons) for easier navigation.
FFlagAXCatalogCategoryPillsShowAllCatego.purpose: It helps players find and browse items in the catalog more efficiently, making it easier to discover new things to use in their games.

FFlagStudioFixStandalonePluginUnloadingA.mechanism: This flag improves the way plugins are unloaded in Roblox Studio, making the process smoother and more reliable.
FFlagStudioFixStandalonePluginUnloadingA.purpose: It ensures that when developers remove plugins, it happens without causing errors, leading to a better experience when working on game development.

FFlagAXQuickButtonsFrameShouldAlwaysExis.mechanism: This flag ensures that a specific set of quick action buttons is always available on the screen for players.
FFlagAXQuickButtonsFrameShouldAlwaysExis.purpose: It makes it easier for players to access important features quickly, improving their overall gaming experience.

FFlagAppChatIllustrationsUpdate.mechanism: This flag updates the visual illustrations used in the chat feature of the app.
FFlagAppChatIllustrationsUpdate.purpose: It enhances the chat experience by making it more visually appealing and engaging for players.

FFlagFixBlurryImages.mechanism: This flag activates a feature that improves how images are displayed, making sure they are clear and sharp instead of fuzzy.
FFlagFixBlurryImages.purpose: It helps players see images, like game icons or textures, more clearly, enhancing the overall visual experience.

FStringIxpNewLayersForRegistration.mechanism: This flag introduces new layers in the registration process, allowing for better organization and handling of user data.
FStringIxpNewLayersForRegistration.purpose: It makes signing up for Roblox smoother and more efficient, helping new players get into games faster.
